attributes.comment:
The amount of money already required to complete the adoption makes it cost
prohibitive for many families. To increase the filing fees for the USCIS by so
much, many children and parents would never be united. The parents simply
would not be able to pay all the fees involved. Also, with the length of the wait
from most foreign countries currently, adoptive parents have to file these papers
twice to have they remain valid during travel. To increase the fees passes along a
double increase to the families. Please help these children and parents find each
other. Do Not Raise the fees for adoption filings.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
